MGU Kerala Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Security Staff Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 14, 2025, 17:23 IST
 Kerala Public Service Commission
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 14-Aug-2025 |  Kerala |  Salary : 20,385 to 20,385




FOLLOW

Mahatma Gandhi University, Kerala (MGU Kerala) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Security Staff Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass can grab this chance and apply for the MGU Kerala Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Kerala.

MGU Kerala Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Security Staff 	01	10th Pass

Age Limit for the MGU Kerala Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 18 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 30 years.

Selection Process for the MGU Kerala Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the MGU Kerala Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 20,385 /- per month.

Application fee for the MGU Kerala Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the MGU Kerala Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Security Staff Jobs in 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, send the application form to the email address given below.

Email Address

notificationada4@mgu.ac.in

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	14-08-2025
Last Date of Application	20-08-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
